thread.title: Online offers on high-end smartphones in the UAE
thread.title_full: Online offers on high-end smartphones in the UAE | The National

author: thenational.ae
title: Online offers on high-end smartphones in the UAE
text:
Samsung Galaxy Note 5: Dh1,998 
Benefits: First launched to the UAE market in August for Dh2,799 the Samsung Galaxy Note 5 32G can now be snapped up for just Dh1,998, according to the shopping comparison website pricena.com. The deal, available from hatifkom.com, comes with a one-year warranty with delivery taking one to two days. The phablet, available in black and gold, is the latest release from Samsung.
Beware: Delivery may cost extra.

LG G4: Dh1,479 
Benefits: First released on to the UAE market in May this year for Dh2,699, the LG G4 is now available for Dh1,479 from mobileshop.ae. The device, popular for its 16-megapixel camera and 5.5-inch IPS display, comes with a one-year warranty and is available in six colours. Payment can be by card, PayPal or cash on delivery.
Beware: Delivery can take up to three days.

Apple iPhone 6, Dh1,999 
Benefits: The new 16 GB iPhone 6S may be available in the UAE, but if you want a high-end Apple device without the high-end price of Dh2,599, then spend just Dh1,999 for the 16 GB Apple iPhone 6 instead. Available from landmarkshops.com, the offer includes 24-hour delivery, free shipping and one-day delivery. Payment can be by card or cash.
Beware: Itâ€™s tough buying an older model when a newer version has just been released.
